on_entry: /execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s jblocks matches 0 run setblock 0 0 0 grass
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s jblocks matches 0 run titleraw @s title {"rawtext":[{"text":"the_jungle"}]}
/execute as @s unless block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s jblocks matches 0 run scoreboard players add @s jblocks 1
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s jblocks matches 0..699 run event entity @e[type=ks:floating_text] despawn
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s jblocks matches 0..699 run function jungle
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s jblocks matches 700 run event entity @s roofet_forest
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s jblocks matches 700 run summon ks:timer 0 1 0
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 air if score @s jblocks matches 700 run setblock 0 0 0 bedrock
/execute as @s if block 0 0 0 bedrock if score @s jblocks matches 700 run scoreboard players set @s jblocks 701
